name: Tornado Stopper
description:
Tornado Stopper is a unique fast paced reaction time game that needs quick reflexes and good timing to catch the light as it races around the track. Avoid explosive land mines and other obstacles in 20 faster and faster levels.

You've probably played light chase games in arcades, and now you can play on your iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad, but with more levels and more challenges.

The challenge is to land on the progressive JackPot for big scores. The flashing light moves fast around the course, and the challenge is to hit the stop button at exactly the right time to score big. The first 5 or 6 levels are not too hard, but few mortals make it past level 15.

Game Play :

Tornado Stopper is a fast paced hand/eye coordination skill game where quick reflexes and good timing are needed to follow the light as it races around the track.

You follow the light as it races around the track, and hit the stop button to stop the light on scoring positions. Land on the JackPot for a big score increase and move to higher levels.

In the help section, you can use the Training Camp to hone your timing and reaction skills, and measure your reaction times.

20 Levels :

Beginning levels start out slow, and higher levels move faster and faster. Top levels use multiple lights, mines, and random HyperDrive mode for blistering speed.

Scoring :

Each spin costs points, but if you land on scoring positions you can reduce the cost of your spin.

Each level has a minimum and maximum score. Staying above the minimum keeps you in the level, and going above the maximum jumps you to the next level.

Each spin, the JackPot is increased until you hit it, and HyperDrive multiplies the JackPot.

In higher levels, be careful to avoid landing on mines, they reduce your score by the JackPot amount.
